document_data.name: Key to the City
document_data.mainbody: '''''Keys to the city''''' were [[gold]]en ceremonial [[key]]s bestowed by the [[Purple Dragons]] upon those who aided [[Eveningstar]]. Recipients were also made honorary Purple Dragon [[Blade (rank)|Blade]]s.
document_data.Powers: Although ''keys to the city'' didn't open any doors, they were imbued with the highly specialized ''[[muster at Eveningstar]]'' spell, which could teleport their holder to Eveningstar's Market Square.
document_data.History: As of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, ''keys to the city'' were distributed by [[Dint]], a Purple Dragon [[Battlemaster]] stationed at Eveningstar.
